summary: The document appears to be an internal statement from Deutsche Bank regarding non-adherence to governance requirements. It includes explanations for deviations and mentions the acceptance of potential risks by the delegating person or chairperson. The content is marked as confidential and is intended for internal use only.
keyFacts: The document discusses non-adherence to core Committee Governance requirements.
It reflects explanations for deviations provided by the unit.
The delegating person or chairperson accepts potential risks from these deviations.
The document is marked as confidential and for internal use only.
